name: Basilica of San Vitale
description: A late antique church in Ravenna, known for its stunning mosaics.
notes: Important site for studying Byzantine art and architecture.

name: Mausoleum of Galla Placidia
description: An ancient Roman building featuring early Christian mosaics.
notes: Notable for its rich mosaic decoration.

name: Neonian Baptistery
description: One of the oldest monuments in Ravenna, celebrated for its mosaics.
notes: Also known as the Orthodox Baptistery.

name: Basilica of Sant'Apollinare Nuovo
description: A basilica church in Ravenna, originally built by King Theodoric the Great.
notes: Renowned for its stunning mosaics depicting biblical scenes.
